name: A vibrant looking broken blade (1h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (nice in general).
It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It does asphyxiation damage unbelievably much.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance strongly.
In the heat of the battle this blade can sometimes release a pulse of energy.
